name: RealPractice
overview: RealPractice, Inc. provides legal technology products and services for attorneys and law firms in the United States and internationally. Its products include RealDealDocs, which provides attorneys, researchers, and legal professionals with access to executed legal agreements and documents drafted by lawyers at America’s law firms and corporations; SmartRules that offers court rules and related procedures; and RealDealForms, which enables attorneys, businesses, and consumers to use legal forms and templates prepared and maintained by attorneys. The companyâ€™s products also include RealCourtDocs, a litigation tool that allows users to search for and access real court filings and documents that are filed in federal court by civil litigators in the United States; and Real Knowledge Management, a tool for identifying and retrieving work product residing internally in mid-to-large law firms. It serves solo practitioners and technology companies. The company was formerly known as Practice Technologies, Inc. and changed its name to RealPractice, Inc. in June 2010. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Venice, California.
